fn.p: Contributors: AJG, RZ, RS, LM, DB, MK, RG, LK and POD developed the trial protocol and follow-up schedule. LK and MK performed the literature review prior to grant submission. AJG, RZ and DB all contributed to the writing of the manuscript and finalising prior to submission. AJG is the chief investigator for the study.
Funding: The trial is funded by the UK Stem Cell Foundation (Registered Charity No: 1110009).
Ethics approval: The protocol has been approved by the National Research Ethics Service Committee (London, Harrow; reference 13/LO/1670).
Provenance and peer review: Not commissioned; externally peer reviewed.
